meta.title: From RAGS to RICHES
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: Going from rags to riches, or from zero to hero, means to ascend, whether you're increasing your wealth or your status.

ladder.clue: Add an S to <> and anagram to get something often covering the ground
Change one letter in <> to get some alumni
{} <>, term for a region of the world
Change the vowel pronunciation in <> from long to short to get a computer
Something a snob might be too <> for?
Drop the first letter of <> and it sounds like some wealth
